vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.25;
son of: Eber (H5677);
brother of: Peleg (H6389);
father of: Almodad (H0486), Sheleph (H8026), Hazarmaveth (H2700), Jerah (H3392), Hadoram (H1913A), Uzal (H0187), Diklah (H1853), Obal (H5745), Abimael (H0039), Sheba (H7614H), Ophir (H0211), Havilah (H2341I) and Jobab (H3103)
§ Joktan = "smallness"
son of Eber and descendant of Shem and patriarch of various Arabian tribes
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Héber; descendiente de Sem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約坍 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "小"
希伯的兒子, 閃的後裔, 許多阿拉伯部落的祖先
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约坍 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "小"
希伯的儿子, 闪的后裔, 许多阿拉伯部落的祖先
